text: This obsoletes IRM 4.11.7, Examining Officers Guide, Corporate

The information contained in this IRM is either technical and does not offer instructions to staff as detailed in IRM 1.11.2, Internal Revenue Manual (IRM) Process, or is addressed in existing IRM(s). majority of this information is no longer current. Current technical information relating to corporate liquidations and dissolutions is now located in the Corporate Liquidations chapter of the Distributions and Liquidations book within the Corporate/Business Issues & Credits Knowledge Base.

IRM Reference Description of Change • IRM 4.11.7.1 Most references were obsolete. • Relevant technical content is located throughout the Corporate/Business Issues & Credits Knowledge Base. • IRM 4.11.7.2 Relevant technical content is located in the Corporate Liquidations chapter of the Distri- butions and Liquidations book. • IRM 4.11.7.3 Relevant technical content is located throughout the Corporate Liquidations chap- ter of the Distributions and Liquidations book. • IRM 4.11.7.4 Relevant technical content is located in the Complete Liquidations section of the Corpo- rate Liquidations chapter of the Distributions and Liquidations book. • IRM 4.11.7.5 Relevant technical content is located in the Treatment of Shareholders section of the Corporate Liquidations chapter of the Distri- butions and Liquidations book. • IRM 4.11.7.6 Relevant technical content is located in the Treatment of Liquidating Corporation section of the Corporate Liquidations chapter of the Distributions and Liquidations book. • IRM 4.11.7.7 Relevant technical content is located throughout the Corporate Liquidations chap- ter of the Distributions and Liquidations book.

IRM Reference Description of Change • IRM 4.11.7.8 Relevant technical content is located throughout the S-Corporation Knowledge Base. • IRM 4.11.7.9 Current information from 4.11.7.9(1) can be found in IRM 25.6.22.6.17.4, Prompt As- sessment IRC 6501(d). • Current information from 4.11.7.9(2) through (4) can be found in IRM 25.6.22.5.8.1, Executed by Authorized Representative, IRM 25.6.22.6.2.4, Dissolved Corporations, IRM 25.6.22.6.2.5, Merged Corporations, and IRM 4.10.13.3.3.3, How State Corporate Dissolution Law Affects an Examination. • Current information from 4.11.7.9(5) can be found in IRM 25.6.23.4.5, Responsibility for Investor Returns – Non-TEFRA, and IRM Exhibit 25.6.23-3, Instructions for Updating the Statute on AIMS, Alpha Code GG.
Examination personnel in SB/SE and LB&I.
